Cosmic Yearly Forecast

üìñ Understanding Your Yearly Forecast

Your Cosmic Yearly Forecast provides a bird's-eye view of the year ahead, weaving together multiple wisdom traditions:

  • Personal Year Number: Your numerological theme for the entire year‚Äîthe lessons, opportunities, and energy you're navigating.
  • Chinese Zodiac Year: The animal and element ruling this year, and how it interacts with your birth animal.
  • Mercury Retrogrades: All retrograde periods for the year, so you can plan major decisions wisely.
  • Month by Month Overview: Your personal month number for each month, revealing energy shifts throughout the year.

Use this forecast for long-range planning. Return monthly to check the energy shifts. Remember: you are the author of your story‚Äîthese cosmic insights inform but never dictate.
